column1: Table 7-5: Alaska Air Quality Nonattainment Areas for Carbon Monoxide (CO)
KEY: ED = election district; NA = not applicable.

NOTES FOR DATA ON THIS PAGE:  Nonattainment areas do not meet the national primary or secondary ambient air quality standard for the specified pollutant.  Nonattainment areas are classified based on design values:  Serious = an area with a design value of 16.5 parts per million (ppm) and above; Moderate = an area with a design value of 9.1 up to 16.4 ppm.
SOURCES FOR DATA ON THIS PAGE:  U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, Green Book, available at http://www.epa.gov/oar/oaqps/greenbk/anay.html as of April 20, 2002.
